meanings.definition: A dish consisting of small pieces of meat or vegetables grilled on a skewer.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat kebobs at the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious kebobs with a side of rice.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone fought over the last kebob on the grill.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling kebobs filled the air at the food festival.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kebobs looked like edible rainbows on sticks.

meanings.definition: To cook food on a skewer.
meanings.sent1: We will kebob the chicken before grilling it.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys kebobbing various meats for the family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally kebobbed his finger while preparing the meal.
meanings.sent4: The friends decided to kebob some marshmallows over the campfire.
meanings.sent5: He carefully kebobs the vegetables to ensure even cooking.
